name: Fifi and the Flowertots: Fifi's Garden Party
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

You are invited to join the Flowertots at Fifi's garden party!

Oh no, Fifi Forget-Me-Not has forgotten about the garden party she is organising for her Flowertot friends. Join Fifi and Bumble as they explore the Flowertot Garden, solving puzzles and playing games to collect yummy treats for the party!
  • 15 flowertot-fantastic puzzle games
  • 3 levels of difficulty - Easy, Medium and Hard to suit all ages
  • Play tun games and solve puzzles with everyone's favorite Flowertot characters
  • Encourages the development of memory, logic and problem solving skills
